reviewText: I love the makers of these stories. They tell it as it is. Off course they take their license for what is not specified in the bible but these are the closest you can get to the written word. My kids like them a lot and everybody in church complement me on how much my kids know their Bible! It's fun
bella historia, que brinda de forma animica a nuestros hijos lo que fue la creacion, es divertida y se las recomiendo a todos los nios para su aprendizaje, ajustado a la biblia.
